function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Wearable sensor technology may provide a false sense of security, leading to decreased vigilance in following other necessary precautions.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and infection due to reduced adherence to preventive measures.","Mitigation":"Educating users about the limitations of wearable sensor technology and emphasizing the importance of other preventive measures such as mask-wearing and social distancing.","Technologies":"Educational campaigns, public health messaging, and community outreach programs.","People":"Users of wearable sensor technology, general population at risk of disease spread.","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations, wearable technology companies."},{"Description":"Inaccurate readings from wearable sensors may lead to misdiagnosis or delayed diagnosis of diseases.","Impact":"Potential for mismanagement of health conditions and delayed treatment, leading to worsened health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and verification of wearable sensor technology, combined with medical professional interpretation of data.","Technologies":"Calibration protocols, quality control measures, medical expertise.","People":"Patients using wearable sensors, healthcare providers.","Owner":"Wearable technology companies, healthcare organizations, medical professionals."},{"Description":"Dependence on wearable technology for disease detection may lead to neglect of traditional diagnostic methods and clinical assessment.","Impact":"Missed opportunities for early detection and intervention, leading to progression of diseases without timely medical attention.","Mitigation":"Promotion of balanced approach, combining wearable technology with traditional diagnostic methods and clinical assessment.","Technologies":"Integrated diagnostic platforms, medical training and education, interdisciplinary healthcare collaboration.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, medical researchers.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, medical institutions, research organizations."}]}
